If doctor call you in cabin and during discussion if you forget anything to ask and come out of his cabin .
Doctor does allow to ask again .   Even if there is no crowd .*** ****** ****** * ****** **** ** *** * *** **** ****** **** *** **** *********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Kini was referred to me by a friend. 
I found him to be very patient and explained the problem and the solutions very lucidly. 
Extremely courteous and cordial. 
I have a fear factor but after meeting up with him I am confident that my treatment will go through smoothly. 
Thank you Dr.Kini..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My son is receiving teeth alignment treatment using metal braces from Dr. Ameet Kini.

Before visiting Dr. Ameet Kini’s Power Smiles Dental Speciality clinic, we had consulted two other dentists and both the dentists explained that for my son, one permanent tooth extraction will be required to make space for teeth alignment.

But when we met Dr. Ameet Kini, he explained that for teeth alignment, permanent teeth extraction should be avoided as far as possible as teeth removal can cause health issues later on and that in my son's case teeth extraction is not required.

We knew that we had come to the right place and decided to start the treatment with Dr. Ameet Kini. He is friendly and approachable and explained the treatment procedure in detail. After 9 months of braces, the teeth are already aligned properly and look good. The steady progress is completely worth it and no permanent teeth were removed. We are happy with the results. 
I highly recommend Dr. Ameet Kini for braces treatment.

The clinic is clean and hygienic and the staff is polite.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went with a bad tooth ache and got to know it could only be saved with root canal , I was super scared and cried almost for a day thinking about the procedure , read and viewed everything related to RCT which only added fuel to my fear.

However , throughout the 5 day long process , dr made me most comfortable , checked intermittently if I was ok , explained the procedure and how to take care of my teeth going forward .

I have seen such compassionate and empathetic doctors only  in my hometown Kerala who finds time to calm down the patients . Thanks doc for being so friendly and calming down my nerves , it felt like a breeze and my experience was incredible . Definitely recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We had a very pleasant experience with Dr. Ameet Kini, Dr. Sujatha Ameet and their staff. We were vary of consulting a dentist during this Pandemic, however our anxieties were put to rest right from the process of obtaining an appointment. Enough information was collected regarding the patient's current health status. The appointments were well sorted and there were no overlaps, so that there wasn't any waiting time. 

We were thermally screened and disinfected with a disinfectant before being permitted into the premises. The facility was very well sanitized and used air filters and foggers to maintain good air quality.

We were anxious about the procedure, but Dr. Ameet was very patient with us and spent time trying to understand the problem and calm us down. The staff were very helpful, kind and always available to help. Dr. Ameet is very professional and he took the time to explain what needed to be done and provided valuable advice. It's not easy to find a good dentist for your kids, I highly recommend Dr. Ameet Kini, Dr. Sujatha Ameet for kids as well as adults.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had avoided visiting a dentist for years despite the  increasing gaps in my teeth. I was afraid of going through a lot of unnecessary and expensive treatments. Dr. Ameet was recommended to me by a freind.

On the first visit he clearly laid out treatment options and helped me to choose one that best suited my budget and time. He also didnt add any extra unnecessary treatments.
This is very important to mention because 
A dentist I had visited prior to him told me I needed to remove a "dead tooth and gave me only two options the prohibitively expensive invisaligners and braces which I didnt want to go through again. I was very relieved to know that I didn't have to get any teeth pulled out before starting the treatment. 
Dr. Ameet is very patient and honest about answering all questions and doubts and gives a balanced reply so that the patient can take an informed decision. 
He is very flexible about working around the given time frame to meet the patients needs and priorities.
I am extremely happy about the way my treatment is going and look forward to having teeth back in shape again!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is very friendly . Communication towards patients is quite good .  Treatment is worth while..........

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We had great experience with Dr. Ameet Kini & their staff, After returning from US , it was required to continue to have braces for my daughter, after bit of research & feedback, we met Ameet Kini who is really a knowledgeable and friendly  nature, which helped us to get answers for all our questions and he indeed explained with patience.  
Taken at most care during this period of COVID – 19 , face mask and appointments are must,& that  is really required for current situation  too. 
After 4 sittings, for braces, now teeth look really good for my daughter, I highly recommend Dr. Ameet Kini  for your teeth problems.

context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Scaling / Polishing,
review: I visited Dr. Ameet Kini for a regular dental checkup. I used to experience soreness around the wisdom teeth in the recent past. After examining, he clearly explained the potential problems I could have because of the odd position of my 3 wisdom teeth. I also had a deep cavity in another tooth. Considering I only had a month's time in town, the Wisdom Teeth Extraction and the Root  Canal Treatment had to be planned and implemented in a short span. Dr. Ameet meticulously carried out the procedures while guiding me to better handle the pain and maintain good oral hygiene.  In the end, it was a successful one!

review: Very nice doctor 10/10, highly recommended. Extremely clean and organised clinic. Excellent experience.
He did explain me the issue correctly. However he provided No bill or file and charged me higher. I was surprised to see how such a reputed dr try to evade taxes.
reply_text: Thank you for visiting PowerSmiles dental clinic. All treatment is done by a specialist and the fee for it is reasonable. You can collect your bill anytime from the clinic on demand. The reason for not providing a paper bill or file is environmental awareness and not for tax evasion as you have assumed and alleged. I request that you resolve these issues in person fruitfully rather than a baseless anonymous post.
